cRefPattern.p: This pattern references a specific line.
This pattern references an inscribed surface on an object.

div.l: The hoe is the kingal official on/in the u land(?) of the river
At the chamber/door(?) of the site(?) of the agrun chamber, the hoe is the vizier
Evildoers are children of the hoe during the waning moon(?)
By means of/in(?) the regular day(?) they are born towards(!?) heaven(?)
Towards heaven the altirigu bird is the bird of a god
Towards the earth it is the hoe, in the reedbed it is a dog, in the thicket it is an u≈°umgal creature
At the site of battle it is a durallu ax
At the site of the fortification, it is an alluhab net(?)
